name: BeachSweeper
description:
*click on screen to enable sound*

You were happily sailing the seven seas all your life, that is until despite several warnings from your fellow sailors about the captain's short and furious temper you got cocky with him over whatever petty reason.

That is all it took for the captain to maroon you in a small island with giant crabs leaving you with a gun and a single bullet as a sign of mercy.

With your trusty gun and a compass, your only hope to survive is to fully explore the island avoiding the crabs and the pitfalls of quicksand. Both of which will kill you in 1 blow.

The crabs are pretty violent as well as very much vulnerable. If it finds you , it will chase and kill you in 1 hit but if you are lucky enough to fire a bullet through it before it reaches you, it dies. Use your bullet wisely, don't waste it.

This Game is a broader version of minesweeper with fps and 3d.

CONTROLS:

WASD - Movement

Shift + WASD - Run

Space - Jump

Mouse - Pan camera

M - Open/close mini-map

R - Restart level

Left Click - Shoot
